articles.title: Aldi Has a $23 Copycat of a $90 Williams Sonoma Pot - Allrecipes
articles.description: The latest Aldi Finds cookware includes a stainless steel pot that resembles a similar stockpot from Williams Sonoma. Shoppers can score the copycat for less than a third of the price.
articles.content: Aldi is coming for Williams Sonoma again. The budget-friendly grocery store has been releasing incredible copycats lately, from a $20 version of a $100 serving bowl to a $5 copycat that every kitchen… [+1917 chars]
